question: Which of the following country displays its first unmanned attack helicopter recently?
explanation: China displayed its first unmanned combat helicopter AV500W for foreign buyers in the northeastern Tianjin city, China. Aviation Industry Corp of China (AVIC), state-owned aircraft manufacturer, displayed the military observation cum combat helicopter at the fourth China Helicopter Expo, in China. This has been done in a move to enlarge its market of military drones abroad.
